tool_description:
Helper functions that might be useful for you to use such as UUID Generator, Base64, JSON, Array, String manipulation, Hash MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, Aragon2, Bcrypt
#ascii #encoder #decoder #uuid #slug #converter
I'm on telegram chat me if there a problem/request
https://t.me/iiyann25
title: Helper Function

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description:
Generate Random String with custom length
BASIC: 20 
PRO: 30
ULTRA: 70
MEGA: 150

api_list.name: MD5 Encode
api_list.description: Encodes  a string so that it conforms to the MD5 Data Encodings specification.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://helper-function.p.rapidapi.com/encoder/md5-encode"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helper-function.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Undot
